aka: A Body Exploded into a Thousand Pieces
this_title: Un cuerpo estalló en mil pedazos
trans_title: A Body Exploded into a Thousand Pieces
introduction: The echoes of Jorge Bonino resonate in the spaces he inhabited, and his presence becomes imaginable from the stories that tell it. A body that exploded into a thousand pieces scattered across territories and affections that speak of him as someone capable of turning life into an extraordinary game.
foreign_title: Un cuerpo estalló en mil pedazos
